    • Coffee

      public Coffee(String size, int quantity, boolean cream, boolean syrup, boolean milk, boolean caramel, boolean whipCream)
      Constructor of Coffee class to instantiate local variables
      Parameters:
      size - size of coffee
      quantity - number of cups of coffee
      cream - if cream is being added
      syrup - if syrup is being added
      milk - if milk is being added
      caramel - if caramel is being added
      whipCream - if whipped cream is being added
